import moment from "moment" import { ChatAltIcon, EyeIcon, PlusIcon, ShareIcon, ThumbUpIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import { useState } from "react" import PostOptions from "../../containers/ThreadDetailsPage/postOptions" import api from "../../util/api" export default function Post({ user, setUser, post, forumId, threadId, setThread, setPosts }) { function toggleLike() { const likedPosts = user.favoritePosts if (likedPosts.includes(post)) { likedPosts.filter((p) => p !== post) post.likes = post.likes + 1 } else { likedPosts.push(post) post.likes = post.likes - 1 } user.favoritePosts = likedPosts console.log(user.favoritePosts) console.log(post.likes) api.editUser(user.id, user) .then((response) => { setUser(response.data) }) api.editPost(forumId, threadId, post) .then((response) => { setThread(response.data) }) } // console.log(user.favoritePosts) return (
  • {/*
    */}

    {post.creator.username}

    {moment().subtract(moment().diff(post.createdAt.slice(0, -5))).calendar()}

    {post.content}

    • ) }
